```{r}
#Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
#Upload fully formatted microscopy data
# micro <- read_csv(here("outputs", "micro_master_2021-10-18.csv"))

#Upload microscopy data merged with physical and biogeochemical measures
data <- read_csv(here("outputs", "ctd_merge_2021-11-04_chem.csv")) 

tchla <- read_csv(here("outputs", "tchla_calibration_2022-08-04.csv"))



#Uploading chemtax data

```

```{r}
#Removing QU39 from sheets
# micro <- micro %>% 
#   filter(!site_id == "QU39")

data <- data %>% 
  filter(!site_id == "QU39")
```

```{r}
#Adding location to sheets and then creating unique station names for merging and plotting

#Making a location column.
data <- data %>% 
    mutate(location = case_when(site_id == "DFO2" ~ "F",
                              site_id == "KC10" ~ "C",
                              site_id == "QCS01" ~ "S",
                              TRUE ~ as.character(site_id)))

# micro <- micro %>% 
#     mutate(location = case_when(site_id == "DFO2" ~ "F",
#                               site_id == "KC10" ~ "C",
#                               site_id == "QCS01" ~ "S",
#                               TRUE ~ as.character(site_id)))

#Order locations from fjord to shelf
order_loc <- c("F", "C", "S")

#Apply ordering to data for 
data <- arrange(mutate(data,
                       location = factor(location, levels = order_loc)))

# micro <- arrange(mutate(micro,
#                        location = factor(location, levels = order_loc)))
```

```{r}
pys_chem <- data %>% 
  select(location, temp_dm:secchi_depth)
```




```{r}
#Creating site-id for merging with PCA clusters.
data <- data %>% 
  unite(sample_name, c(location, date), sep = "", remove = FALSE) %>% 
  relocate(sample_name, .before = date)


```

```{r}
#I want to look at annual averages of important variables

#Global medians grouped by station
data_glob_loc <- data %>% 
  filter(!site_id == "QU39") %>% 
  select(location, temp_dm:bulk_chl) %>% 
  mutate(n_p = no2_dm/po4_dm,
         si_n = sio2_dm/no2_dm) %>% 
  group_by(location) %>% 
  summarise(across(temp_dm:si_n, .f = list(mean = mean, median = median,
                                               min = min, max = max, sd = sd),
                   na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()

```


```{r}
#Statistical tests showed that silicate was different between years for DFO2 only

#Looking at annual means in silicate for DFO2
annual_dfo2_sio2 <- data %>% 
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(date)) %>% 
  filter(site_id == "DFO2") %>% 
  select(year, sio2_dm) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(across(sio2_dm, .f = list(mean = mean, median = median,
                                               min = min, max = max, sd = sd),
                   na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()
```


```{r}
#Nutrient Ratios show some crazy trends due to zero values. Filtering out for stats calculationg.

#Removing zero PO4 values
n_p <- data %>% 
  filter(!site_id == "QU39") %>%
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(date)) %>% 
  select(year, location, no2_dm, po4_dm) %>% 
  filter(po4_dm > 0 & no2_dm > 0) %>% 
  mutate(n_p = no2_dm/po4_dm)
  
#Calculating stats for N:P by station
n_p_loc <- n_p %>% 
  group_by(location) %>% 
  summarise(across(n_p, .f = list(mean = mean, median = median,
                                               min = min, max = max, sd = sd),
                   na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()

s_n <- data %>% 
  filter(!site_id == "QU39") %>% 
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(date)) %>%
  select(year, location, sio2_dm, no2_dm) %>% 
  filter(no2_dm > 0 & sio2_dm > 0) %>% 
  mutate(s_n = sio2_dm/no2_dm) 


s_n_2 <- data %>% 
  filter(!site_id == "QU39") %>% 
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(date)) %>%
  select(year, location, sio2_dm, no2_dm) %>% 
  filter(no2_dm >= 0.5 & sio2_dm > 0) %>% 
  mutate(s_n = sio2_dm/no2_dm)

s_n_loc <- s_n %>% 
  group_by(location) %>% 
  summarise(across(s_n, .f = list(mean = mean, median = median,
                                               min = min, max = max, sd = sd),
                   na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup() 


```

```{r}
#Trying Kruskal Wallis Test followed by Dunn's test if differences found. Instead of creating separate code for each parameter - just changing code depending on what I am looking at.


kruskal.test(n_p ~ location, data = n_p)

#Dunn
FSA::dunnTest(n_p$n_p ~ n_p$location,
         data = data,
         method = "bonferroni")

```

```{r}


my_comparisons <- list( c("F", "C"), c("F", "S"))

f1 <- ggboxplot(data, x = "location", y = "temp_dm",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5) + 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons,
                     label.y = c(14.5, 15.2), size = 7) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 16.5, size = 6) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = expression("Temperature ("*~degree*C*")")) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        axis.text = element_text(colour = "black")) 
  
my_comparisons2 <- list(c("C", "S"), c("F", "S"))

f2 <- ggboxplot(data, x = "location", y = "sal_dm",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5)+ 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons2,
                     label.y = c(32.2, 32.7), size = 7) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 33.5, size = 6) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Salinity") +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        axis.text = element_text(colour = "black")) 

my_comparisons3 <- list( c("F", "C"), c("C", "S"), c("F", "S"))

ggboxplot(data, x = "location", y = "delta_rho_dm",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5)+ 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons3,
                     label.y = c(16, 9, 18), size = 7) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 21.5, size = 6) +
  theme_bw() +
  ylim(0, 22) +
  labs(y = expression(Delta*rho)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        text = element_text(size = 25),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        axis.text = element_text(colour = "black")) 

ggboxplot(data, x = "location", y = "sio2_dm",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5)+ 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 47) +
  theme_bw()

ggboxplot(data, x = "location", y = "secchi_depth",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5)+ 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 18) +
  theme_bw()

ggboxplot(tchla, x = "location", y = "tchla",
          fill = "location", palette = "jco", size = 0.5)+ 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = my_comparisons3) + 
  stat_compare_means(label.y = 18) +
  theme_bw()

```
